alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 7:22AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Powder Springs affecting Paulding and Cobb Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Powder Springs. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands...fields and pastures of the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Brownsville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 AM EST Friday was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
